Based on the search results from GSMArena, there are several models within the Vivo V40 series. The exact match for your query is the standard **vivo V40**, but there are also Pro, Lite, and 'e' variants available.

Here are the devices found, along with links to their detailed specification pages:

| Device Name | Link to Full Specifications |
| :--- | :--- |
| **vivo V40** | [View Specs](https://www.gsmarena.com/vivo_v40-13121.php) |
| vivo V40 Pro | [View Specs](https://www.gsmarena.com/vivo_v40_pro-13239.php) |
| vivo V40 Lite | [View Specs](https://www.gsmarena.com/vivo_v40_lite-13207.php) |
| vivo V40e | [View Specs](https://www.gsmarena.com/vivo_v40e-13339.php) |
| vivo V40 SE | [View Specs](https://www.gsmarena.com/vivo_v40_se-12905.php) |
| vivo V40 Lite (IDN) | [View Specs](https://www.gsmarena.com/vivo_v40_lite_(idn)-13353.php) |
| vivo V40 Lite 4G (IDN) | [View Specs](https://www.gsmarena.com/vivo_v40_lite_4g_(idn)-13360.php) |

**Note:** The search results identify the specific models, but the detailed technical data (such as processor, camera megapixels, and battery size) is located on the individual device pages linked above. If you are looking for the standard model, please click the first link.
